title: Subtotal Row
reference-overview: The Subtotal Row is a Data Table Add-On. It functions the same way the Total Row Add-On does, it’s just a different color.
reference-usage: Use the Subtotal Row when you want to call out a subtotal on a Data Table. You can’t use a Subtotal Row unless you also have a Total Row Add-On within a Data Table.
reference-details:
Color

The Subtotal Row should default to a lighter background color than the Total Row: #e6e6e6.

Width

You can set the column width using a helper Class. Since the Data Table functions within the Mercer Grid System, it will automatically adapt and configure itself.

Row Details

  • Padding for all Static Data Table rows is set to five pixels on the top and bottom and ten pixels to the left and right.
  • Line height of Static Data Table Subtotal rows is 13 pixels to keep text consistent with Mercer branding.
  • Subtotal Row text is right aligned.
  • Subtotal Row text is always in bold.
reference-mobile: The overall table will stretch to fit 100% of the available width, but part of the table may not initially be viewable. The user can access the complete table by scrolling horizontally.
